name: 4th Dimension
description: Things are falling apart in your dimension. You are a soldier tasked with traveling between past dimensions to retrieve ancient artefacts with magic that could help stabilise your own dimension. We have made it easier for you to travel through space and time through portals around the world, and have ensured you have access to a weapon with unlimited ammo, can you get to the first artefact in, say, 2 minutes?!
